name: Unwavering Hero
description:
Unwavering Hero goes up against the Zombiemancer and his hordes of zombies in this short score-based 3D defense game where you have to protect the innocents of Squareville. The trick is, there shall be no violence and only love shall prevail Wave the zombies into oblivion with your mouse and share the love while rescuing the town!

This game was made as part of a Game Jam and went on to feature at a small comics event where it entertained dozens of giggling children who will soon be zombies.

Credits Nicholas Tan Wai Leong, Keng Boon Lim, Nabilah Raihan bt Zakaria, Yee I-Van
